935:2: liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhranna tu cetasā tat|
935:4: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ|
935:5: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma||2||
935:9: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ||4||
935:10: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya karttā pratigarvitānām|
935:11: aśokamālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokakavanāṃ śuśoca||5||
935:12: priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṅguṃ niśāmya bhītāmiva niṣpatantīm|
935:16: latāṃ praphullāmatimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām|
935:18: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgairiva hemagarbhaiḥ|
935:19: kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣurācikṣipurasya tatra||9||
935:20: gandhaṃ vamanto'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveśyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ|
935:21: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na janhurhṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ||10||
935:23: lelihyamānaiśca madhu dvirephaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda||11||
935:25: kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tattat||12||
935:26: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca|
935:27: tyaktvā priyāmaśrumukhīṃ tapo ye cerūścariṣyanti caranti caiva||13||
935:28: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanamasti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavamāyasaṃ vā|
935:29: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanametadeva mukhaṃ calākṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam||14||
935:30: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāccaiva suhṛdbalācca|
935:31: jñānācca raukṣyācca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayastu pāśaḥ||15||
935:32: jñānaṃ na me tacca śamāya yat syānna na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako'smi|
935:34: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dviguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ|
935:35: sarvāsvavasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogādiva cakravākaḥ||17||
935:36: adyāpi tanme hṛdi vartate ca yaddarpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā|
935:39: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tanme vaco'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi||19||
935:40: buddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣureṣaḥ|
935:41: saktaḥ kvacinnāhamivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntastathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ||20||
935:43: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ||21||
935:46: nirīkṣamāṇasya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam|
935:47: kasyāsti dhairyaṃ navayauvanasya māse madhau dharmasapatnabhūte||23||
935:48: bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ|
935:50: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve madhavānahalyām|
935:51: sattvena sargeṇa ca tena hīnaḥ strinirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo'ham||25||
935:52: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgastatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ|
935:55: bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caledihānyaḥ||27||
935:56: bheje śvapākīṃ munirakṣamālāṃ kāmādvasiṣṭhaśca sa sadvariṣṭhaḥ|
935:57: yasyāṃ vivaśvāniva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto'sya kapiñjalādaḥ||28||
935:59: suto'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakarttā||29||
935:60: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyaṇaśca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhvā|
935:63: sārasvato yatra suto'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā||31||
935:64: tathā nṛparṣerdilīpasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ|
935:67: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rathītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāmbabhūva||33||
935:68: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane'pi śānte'pi ca vartamānaḥ|
935:70: brahmarṣibhāvārthamapāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣvanāsthaḥ|
935:71: sa gādhijaścāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda||35||
935:72: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati sthūlaśirā mumūrccha|
935:75: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa||37||
935:78: rakto girermūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvācca sa tālajaṅghaḥ|
935:79: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne||39||
935:81: janhuśca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatirbhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ||40||
935:84: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānu'śocan prāptāmivorvīṃ striyamurvaśīṃ tām|
935:86: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ|
935:87: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatirdeva ivāttasenaḥ||43||
935:88: svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihīrṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ|
935:89: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmathamutsasarja||44||
935:91: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpādasevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum||45||
935:92: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghāḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ|
935:93: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyāmapaśyan kimu viklavo'ham||46||
935:94: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛhameva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam|
935:95: na hyanyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāccyutasya||47||
935:96: pāṇau kapālamavadhārya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ mānaṃ nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ|
935:97: yasyoddhavo na dhṛtirasti na śāntirasti citrapradīpa iva so'sti ca nāsti caiva||48||
935:98: yo niḥsṛtaśca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyamudvahati yo na ca niṣkaṣāyaḥ|
935:99: pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇairna ca pātrabhūto liṅgaṃ vahannapi sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ||49||
935:100: na nyāyyamanvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktumiti yo'pi hi me vicāraḥ|
935:101: so'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāstānye tapovanamapāsya gṛhāṇyatīyuḥ||50||
935:102: śālbādhipo hi sasuto'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo'ndha eva sa ca sāṃskṛtirantidevaḥ|
935:103: cīrāṇyapāsya dadhire punaraṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāśca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ||51||
935:104: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gururito yāvadeva prayāt-
935:106: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skhalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddhe-
935:108: saundarananda mahākāvye “nanda-vilāpa“ nāma saptama sarga samāpta|
